mentionedBy.name: Jamf Holding Corp.
mentionedBy.notes: Cross-platform MDM acquired by VMware in 2014, supported iOS, Android, Windows Mobile, BlackBerry. Major MDM player but lacked Jamf's deep Apple expertise
